content.rendered:
Voice Call

Crystal-clear voice call solutions

Right out-of-the-box, your users can experience Dolby-quality sound in your apps through the power of Dolby Voice®. Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology backed by decades of expertise in sound signal processing.

Featuring Dolby Voice® Technology

Build your voice solution

Advanced spatial audio

Understand one another better even when users talk over each other. With spatial audio, overlapping voices are separated to make conversations sound natural — resulting in increased user productivity and reduced fatigue.

Noise and echo suppression

Enable more free-flowing conversations and eliminate disruptive “muting” in conferences. Remove unwanted background noise and reduce echoes to maintain a full duplex conversation.

Network resilience

Maintain high-quality audio in challenging network conditions with advanced network resilience that keeps communications running at all times.

Voice processing

Powered by machine learning, our voice activity detector, automatic gain control, and dynamic audio leveling detect when you’re speaking, remove background noise, keep unwanted sounds out, and maintain consistent levels between clients.

Mixing mode

Scale video conferencing with the Dolby Voice® codec to allow participants to hear everything — even at a low bitrate or on a single audio stream. The mixing solution processes more than 15B minutes annually with conference providers, including BlueJeans and British Telecom.

Integrated audio device management

Let us worry about devices. Our SDK automatically detects device characteristics, optimizes on-device audio capture and rendering, and as required, makes instantaneous audio adjustments to accommodate known device issues.

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Music mode (coming soon)

Audio characteristics of voice use cases differ from music use cases. Music mode accounts for these differences to enable a natural and engaging listening experience. Make your next online music lesson or jam session sound its best.

Contact us to learn more

Demo

Experience Dolby.io Spatial Audio

Experience voice and video calls like never before with Dolby.io Spatial Audio — now enhanced with manual Spatial Placement. The Spatial Placement feature enhancement allows developers to manually place sound objects anywhere within a three-dimensional space to create immersive audio scenes. Build high-fidelity, real-time communications and improve the listening experiences with less fatigue.

Experience the demo

Demo

Experience Dolby.io Spatial Audio in the metaverse

Odyssey, an immersive metaverse platform, chose Dolby.io Spatial Audio to give users in the metaverse freedom to move and talk with a high-fidelity experience — like when meeting together in-person. For the full experience, try the demo on a laptop or desktop computer, use headphones, and grab a few friends to join the room.

Experience the demo

Developer Platform

Developer Resources

Public docs

Learn from our getting started guides, tutorials, how-to articles, and interactive API reference explorer.

Sample projects

Start with one of the open-source sample projects on GitHub to accelerate building your application.

Self-service dashboard

  • Create and manage your application API Keys.
  • Monitor account usage, billing, subscription plans, and invoices.
  • Manage access for your team with an enterprise account and get quick access to support.
Sign up for an account Sign up for an account

Documentation

Take me there

Developer blog

Read now
Building the same solution on our own would have taken two years, as opposed to just two months with Dolby.io.

Siva Nagalingam

CEO, MediGuru

Through our own technology, which embeds Dolby.io, high-quality audio in the context of video-based visits is instrumental to having productive conversations with patients and providing the care that they need.

Damon Ramsey

CEO & Co-Founder, InputHealth

Dolby.io’s features, the roadmap that Dolby provides, and the ease of integration enabled us to customize the solution for our constituents—all without sacrificing quality and at a cost that is beneficial.

Siva Nagalingam

CEO, MediGuru

Popular Use Cases

The possibilities are endless

Telehealth

Build HIPAA-compliant communications to support ongoing care and wellness.

Collaboration

Build custom collaboration apps to unite your participants with an open source UX kit that accelerates production.

Classrooms

Deploy lifelike virtual classrooms, training sessions, and webinars that keep remote participants engaged.

Live events

Level up your one-to-many communications with experiences that encourage interaction and audience participation.

Recruiting

Converse with applicants as though you’re face-to-face, even if you’re thousands of miles apart.

Online Broadcasting

Deliver crystal-clear audio and video for nearly any web event, from tens to hundreds of participants.

Get started

Start building with audio and video APIs

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales
